__e: I always knew the people of Hope Valley really cared about each other, but I never realized how much.
It just means we have to change our plans, because everything we need, we have right here, in Hope Valley.
You came back to Hope Valley because this is your home, and the people here are your family.
Perhaps what happened to Hope has happened before.
Giving birth to Hope was probably the best thing I ever did with my life.
Guys, we know you love Hope and we know you want to spend time with her, but... she's gotta be in school.
* I hope you don't mind, I hope you don't mind *
♪ I hope you don't mind, I hope you don't mind ♪
♪ I hope you don't mind, I hope you don't mind ♪
I was all he needed... Until that ... that woman, that ... that Hope, came along and ... and changed things, turned him away from me.
No, come on, Hope, it's got nothing to do with you.
And it turns out Hope does have compassion.
Well, Mary Hope is usually right about these things. [chuckles]
Well, Hope just got her family and she needs you.
